ygData.subject: RE: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: As an aside... On the Concert Hall message board, a fellow bard attempted to complete the quest for the Lambent Breastplate (the one the requires the lute
ygData.messageBody:
As an aside... On the "Concert Hall" message board, a fellow bard attempted
to complete the quest for the Lambent Breastplate (the one the requires the
lute and the carapace?). Anyway, he forked over his Lute, carapace and
required stone, and got absolutely nothing in return. Either the quest is
broken, or the Lute of the Gypsy Princess is NOT the correct lute to use.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 3:21 PM

> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Another question about the new armor quests
>

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> oh and also none of the items needed other than the lute of the gypsy
> princess were in the game before today's patch.
>
> Shada
> >
> >
> > From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> > Are the non-jewelery quest components for the bard armor
> > quests new items
> > that have been added to the game or have they been around for
> > a while? I
> > have never seen or heard anyone auctioning any of the items
> > before (granted
> > I'm not high enough level to go to the places they are found).
> >
